idea-plugin.name: Omni Viewer
idea-plugin.description:
Omni Viewer

A powerful IntelliJ plugin for viewing and editing various file formats including audio, video, images, CSV, and JSONL files.

Features:

  • Audio Viewer: Play, pause, and control audio files directly in IntelliJ
  • Video Viewer: Watch video files with playback controls
  • Image Viewer: View and edit images with zoom and pan capabilities
  • CSV Viewer: View and edit CSV files in a table format
  • JSONL Viewer: View and edit JSON Lines files

Simply open any supported file type in IntelliJ and start viewing or editing!
